item.title: Create Infrastructure for StackStorm
item.description: We are going to create an infrastructure with Terraform that automatically installs StackStorm onto our instance. Variables AWS StackStorm Main Provider AMI Security Groups EC2 Instance Execute Variables AWS Create a new file to store our variables called variables.tf and open it with your favorite text editor. We need to add variables for our AWS keys and we can do so with the following:
